definition: to replay string instrument/fig. to harp on the same string/to raise the same old topic again
to pluck (a string)/to play (a string instrument)/to spring or leap/to shoot (e.g. with a catapult)/(of cotton) to fluff or tease/to flick/to flip/to accuse/to impeach/elastic (of materials)
to play the same old tune (idiom); unoriginal
replaying the same old tunes (idiom); conservative, unoriginal and discredited/to keep harping on about the same old stuff

sentences.english: You've been getting the fourth, the fifth, and the sixth implementation of a good idea funded.
sentences.chinese: 而是第四手甚至更後的，一個新想法都被老調重彈了。

sentences.english: Now he's started on his hobbyhorse.
sentences.chinese: 現在他又開始老調重彈了。

sentences.english: That spokesman is striking up the same old tune.
sentences.chinese: 那個發言人又在老調重彈。

sentences.english: Was this just more of the same or something new?
sentences.chinese: 這究竟是老調重彈還是一種新情況呢？

sentences.english: Don't get him started on his hobbyhorse.
sentences.chinese: 不要讓他又開始他的老調重彈。

sentences.english: That's a string that's been harped on many times before.
A renewal of those worries isn't the only problem currently facing Huawei.
sentences.chinese: 華爲目前面對的問題不單隻這個老調重彈的擔憂。

sentences.english: We can do what we have been doing.
sentences.chinese: 我們也可以一如既往，舊調重彈。

sentences.english: So why are we at it again about shepherds and sheep?
sentences.chinese: 然而我們爲什麼還舊調重彈，一再提到牧人與羊羣呢？

sentences.english: The opposition ridiculed the government's proposals, saying they often have nothing new.
sentences.chinese: 反對派揶揄政府的建議，說成是老調重彈。
